content.body: Andreu Botella: if you do something like `class CustomError extends Error { name = "CustomError" }` the `name` won't get preserved (and neither will the subclass)

Andreu Botella: if you do something like class CustomError extends Error { name = "CustomError" } the name won't get preserved (and neither will the subclass)

content.body: Perhaps that's not a concern though. If they don't end up doing anything like serialization/deserialization I won't care too much.
